description.fr: Lorsque vous invoquez un {Summoning:773!}\_: Votre héros inflige {value:d,percent} de son {%AT} autour <sprite name="cell_around"> de lui.
description.en: When you summon a {Summoning:773!}: Your hero inflicts {value:d,percent} of their {%AT} around<sprite name="cell_around"> it.
description.es: Cuando invocas a un {Summoning:773!}: Tu héroe inflige un {value:d,percent} de su {%AT} a su alrededor\_<sprite name="cell_around">.
description.de: Wenn du einen\_{Summoning:773!} beschwörst: Dein Held verursacht ringsum\_<sprite name="cell_around"> des Nocturien {value:d,percent} seines {%AT} als Schaden.
description.pt: Ao invocar um {Summoning:773!}: Seu herói inflige {value:d,percent} do seu {%AT} em\_volta\_<sprite name="cell_around"> dele.
